statements: UPDATE nft_metadata SET title='Artwork 1', description='Beautiful artwork by Artist A', creator='Artist A' WHERE title='Artwork 1';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET creator='Artist B', title='Artwork 2', description='Unique artwork by Artist B' WHERE title='Artwork 2';

UPDATE nft_metadata SET creator = 'Creator 2', title = 'Updated Title 2', description = 'Updated Description 2';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET description='Updated description', title='New Title' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nft_creator SET email='newemail@example.com', name='New Name' WHERE id=2;
